thread.title: Death squads explode BOMB in ISIS base killing 16 jihadis in fightback against evil cult
thread.title_full: Death squads explode BOMB in ISIS base killing 16 jihadis in fightback against evil cult

title: Death squads explode BOMB in ISIS base killing 16 jihadis in fightback against evil cult
text:
“A mysterious blast took place inside one of the ISIS encampments” Captain Khalil Ibrahim 
At least 16 ISIS fighters were killed in the blast and a number of others were seriously wounded, according to security officials. 
ISIS militants cordoned off the camp and took their wounded their makeshift medical facilities. 
Death cult jihadis’ top chlorine bomb-maker was also killed in Mosul this week in a brazen assassination by a mysterious kill-squad. 
GETTY MOSUL: ISIS are undersiege by the Iraqi Army 
“A mysterious blast took place inside one of the ISIS encampments in al-Hawi, south of Mosul, leaving 16 militants dead and others seriously wounded,” said Captain Khalil Ibrahim, of the Iraqi Police. 
Kill-teams hunting ISIS fighters and commanders have been suggested to be special forces units operating in Mosul . 
The squads are speculated to be spreading unrest and paving the way for the advance of the Iraqi Army. On patrol with the Iraqi forces driving ISIS terrorists from Mosul Wednesday, 18th January 2017 The city of Mosul has been an ISIS stronghold since they took control of the city in January 2014. The Iraqi army claim to have taken it back, and defeated the Islamist terrorists. 1 / 12 CTS soldiers fatigued from battle. Related videos
